sentences.sentence: Your scatty son has forgotten his key again.
sentences.translation: 你那儿子丢三落四又把钥匙给忘了。

sentences.sentence: Your scatty son has forgotten his key again.
sentences.translation: 你那儿子丢叁落四又把钥匙给忘了。

sentences.sentence: You are a bit scatty so you don't check names on payslips before opening them.
sentences.translation: 你有点笨，所以才没核实工资单上的名字就打开看。
